content: {A拍手}Yep, that's the one. You'll need a <style=Highlight>Lumia Battery</style> for every Starsea Voyage. If you've got enough Loomi, better stock up while you can!
info: 前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II

content: Ta-da! We can FINALLY...{A加油} go on a <style=Highlight>Starsea Voyage</style>! <style=SizeSmall>Are we going? Are we going? I'm so hyped, my ears are all twisted up!</style>
info: 前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II

content: Oh right, did you get a <style=Highlight>shovel</style> yet? Glenn says there are lots of pretty flowers out there. Maybe you could dig some up and bring them back~. Here, this one's for you!
info: 前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II

content: Oh? Looks like you have other plans.{A点头} Alright~, come find me when you want to go on a Starsea Voyage. I'm happy to go anywhere as long as it's with you!
info: 前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II
前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II

content: Also, remember to bring companions with you on your Starsea Voyages. {A期待}Everyone's got their own strengths that may come in handy. <style=SizeSmall>Like, say... sweeping up everything with a spinning tornado kick. Just kidding, hee~!</style>
info: 前往星海旅行-莎莎_主流程文本II
